name: AddPurchaseOrderComment
description: Add a comment to a purchase order in Zoho Books.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the organization in Zoho Books. This ID is required to specify which organization's purchase order is being commented on.

parameters.name: purchase_order_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the purchase order in Zoho Books.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the purchase order.

parameters.name: purchase_order_comment_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the comment description and expected delivery date (YYYY-MM-DD) for the purchase order.

expected_delivery_date.description: The expected delivery date when the goods or services ordered in this purchase order should be received. This date is used for planning, scheduling, and tracking deliveries. It helps in managing inventory, coordinating with vendors, and ensuring timely receipt of ordered items. The date should be in YYYY-MM-DD format.
